item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
At NL Learning, accessible from www.nllearning.com, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by NL Learning and how we use it.

If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in NL Learning. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.

Consent

By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

Information we collect

The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.

If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.

When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.

How we use your information

We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

  • Provide, operate, and maintain our webste
  • Improve, personalize, and expand our webste
  • Understand and analyze how you use our webste
  • Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
  • Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the webste, and for marketing and promotional purposes
  • Send you emails
  • Find and prevent fraud

Log Files

NL Learning follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.

Cookies and Web Beacons

Like any other website, NL Learning uses 'cookies'. These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.

For more general information on cookies, please read "What Are Cookies".

Google DoubleClick DART Cookie

Google is one of a third-party vendor on our site. It also uses cookies, known as DART cookies, to serve ads to our site visitors based upon their visit to www.website.com and other sites on the internet. However, visitors may choose to decline the use of DART cookies by visiting the Google ad and content network Privacy Policy at the following URL https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads

Our Advertising Partners

Some of advertisers on our site may use cookies and web beacons. Our advertising partners are listed below. Each of our advertising partners has their own Privacy Policy for their policies on user data. For easier access, we hyperlinked to their Privacy Policies below.

  • Google https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads

Advertising Partners Privacy Policies

You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of NL Learning.

Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on NL Learning, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.

Note that NL Learning has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.

Third Party Privacy Policies

NL Learning's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.

You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.

CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)

Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:

Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.

Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.

Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.

If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

GDPR Data Protection Rights

We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:

The right to access You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.

The right to rectification You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.

The right to erasure You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.

The right to restrict processing You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.

The right to object to processing You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.

The right to data portability You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.

If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

Children's Information

Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

NL Learning does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.

Privacy policy changes

Although most changes are likely to be minro, NL Learning may changes to its privacy policy from time to time and in NL learning's sole discretion.

Your continued use of this site after any change in this privacy policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.

Contact Us

If you have any question and problems related to the privacy policy or usage capture of information feel free to contact us.

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Nllearning is a resource blog - where you will find information on some of the proven ways to make your own blog and money online.

FOUNDER
Nllearning was founded by Nouman Ali, who is Freelancer who provided SEO Report, Analysis website, WordPress website, to a few hundred clients throughout his long freelancing carrier.

At this present date he is operating several niche blogs, YouTube channels, and focused growing websites.

VISION
In the beginning of his journey, Nouman Ali faced lots of trouble with finding right information and guidance towards getting started, and he knows the feelings of beginners when there is no one to help!

Nouman Ali decided to share the experiences which worked out for him and could help beginners to start their online journey.

item.title: What is Woo Commerce? And how does it help cell our products?
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Do you want to start selling online products or services? Woo commerce can be your best option. This post will answer all of your questions, and will tell you what you need to know about to get started.

Woo commerce allows you to sell products and services from your WordPress site. This is a free WordPress plugin with an unbelievable feature in the form of an extension.

Woo commerce automatic is designed by the corporate branch of WordPress, so when you use it, make sure you're in a good place.

What is woo commerce? What is that thing for?

Woo Commerce is to sell products and services. Specially, it makes these things cheap and affordable. You can sell digital and physical products, can inventory and shipping management, take secure payment, and sort the tax automatically.

You can keep 100% control on all your data, support for mobile devices, and capacity is unlimited to scale your sites.

Woo Commerce is now the best design and most popular E-commerce plugin for WordPress. In fact, now it is 42% of all online stores, and is the most popular AL-emergence solution on all websites.

Before using the AWESOME plugin, let's see why the world is the best option to sell the product and services on your website.

Why should we use Woo Commerce?

Since the 2011 for Woo Commerce development, there is a strong development team behind it. Due to its growing popularity, the worldly is getting better and better. And more and more popularity too.

  • Like WordPress, the worldly free and open source. Despite its feelings feel, it is completely free to download, user and managing for anyone.
  • There is several ways to expand the Wash Commerce's functionality.

And, although it is incredibly powerful and extensible, but it is also easy for us to be used for initial people. With the world-by-commerce, no one can run a professional online store from its WordPress website and can run it. You do not really need to know any code. Woo commerce
I will show you how easy it is to do it soon, but firstly, I want to tell you about some of the best parts of Woo Commerce for more information.

Easy install and set up

Installing Woo Commerce is easy to add any other WordPress plugin to your website. This WordPress plugin is available for free from documentary, which is accessible directly from your website Admin.

Once after installing, the worldly is also very easy to set up. Thanks to the Inbuilt Setup Wizard, it takes just a few minutes to achieve the importance aspects of your store including payment and shipping.

Powerful eCommerce features out of the box

Woo Commerce comes with an amazing set of facials right outside the box. Here's just some small selection of these:

  • Any kind of products you like: physical, digital or even anticipate
  • Add unlimited products and images
  • Categories, Tags and Attributes with Ad-Size and Color- To make any products easy and finding
  • To show the product page and product ratings and reverse
  • Customize currency, interface and language language with store location
  • Manage Order and Customer
  • Shipping Open and Stricter Open Up On Customer Location

Did not you see the need to be here? No matter the accompanying the pack pack with you can complete your needs.

Woo Commerce is Welly Extensible

Occasionally, when the plugin is easy to use, then it will be fully ltd. But it is reverse for the world. There are several ways to expand the theme, plugins, extensions, or even the fumigation of the world - if you want to do specifically, you can edit the plugin code.

This means that you can create such a shop that can look and behave in any way.

As you can see, there is everything in the worlds which you want from e-commerce plugin. It does not matter whether you are Beginner or Advance WordPress user - the world-term is aimed for any store. Whether you want to sell from an existing WordPress site or you are planning to start online store from scratch - the World is the Cousins Choice.

We hope that this article will help you learn about the world and know about its feature.

If you liked this article, please subscribe our YouTube Channel for WordPress Video Tutorials. You can also follow us on social media accounts.

NL Learning does not make any warranties about the completeness, reliability and accuracy of this information. Any action you take upon the information you find on this website (NL Learning), is strictly at your own risk. NL Learning will not be liable for any losses and/or damages in connection with the use of our website.

From our website, you can visit other websites by following hyperlinks to such external sites. While we strive to provide only quality links to useful and ethical websites, we have no control over the content and nature of these sites. These links to other websites do not imply a recommendation for all the content found on these sites. Site owners and content may change without notice and may occur before we have the opportunity to remove a link which may have gone 'bad'.

Please be also aware that when you leave our website, other sites may have different privacy policies and terms which are beyond our control. Please be sure to check the Privacy Policies of these sites as well as their "Terms of Service" before engaging in any business or uploading any information. Our Privacy Policy was created by the Privacy Policy Generator.

Consent

By using our website, you hereby consent to our disclaimer and agree to its terms.

Update

Should we update, amend or make any changes to this document, those changes will be prominently posted here.

item.title: Terms and Conditions
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to NL Learning!

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of NL Learning 's Website, located at www.nllearning.com.

By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use NL Learning if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Companys terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Clients needs in respect of provision of the Companys stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Netherlands. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.

Cookies

We employ the use of cookies. By accessing NL Learning, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the NL Learning 's Privacy Policy.

Most interactive websites use cookies to let us retrieve the users details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people visiting our website. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also use cookies.

License

Unless otherwise stated, NL Learning and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on NL Learning. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from NL Learning for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.

You must not:

  • Republish material from NL Learning
  • Sell, rent or sub-license material from NL Learning
  • Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from NL Learning
  • Redistribute content from NL Learning

Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. NL Learning does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of NL Learning ,its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, NL Learning shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.

NL Learning reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions.

You warrant and represent that:

  • You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so;
  • The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party;
  • The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy
  • The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity.

You hereby grant NL Learning a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media.

Hyperlinking to our Content

The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:

  • Government agencies;
  • Search engines;
  • News organizations;
  • Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and
  • System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.

These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking partys site.

We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations:

  • commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources;
  • dot.com community sites;
  • associations or other groups representing charities;
  • online directory distributors;
  • internet portals;
  • accounting, law and consulting firms; and
  • educational institutions and trade associations.

We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of NL Learning ; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.

These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking partys site.

If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to NL Learning . Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response.

Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows:

  • By use of our corporate name; or
  • By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or
  • By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking partys site.

No use of NL Learning 's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement.

iFrames

Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.

Content Liability

We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.

Your Privacy

Please read Privacy Policy

Reservation of Rights

We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and its linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.

Removal of links from our website

If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.

We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date.

Disclaimer

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:

  • limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury;
  • limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation;
  • limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or
  • exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law.

The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.

As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature.

item.title: Some basic WordPress residency practices for bloggers
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Plugins in the WordPress help us to make your blog even friendly. Today in this post we will tell you about some basic WordPress or practices that you can make your post more friendly.

Basic WordPress SEO Practices

There are only some Settings besides the quality content that you can optimized your WordPress blog. It has been mentioned below about some basic WordPress for so many practices that you can generate organic traffic more than your blog.

You can improve the search engine visibility of the basic WordPress community practices by following these basic WordPress practices.

XML Sitemap

Sitemap is a simple page on your site that displays the structure of your site. You can submit your site's site site by the help of Google webmaster tool, which allows Google to discover your site's pages.

You need to verify your site in the webmaster tools to use. Follow the link below to create a blog sitemap in the WordPress.

How to create your blog sitemap

Anchor text is the text that clink the user to land on another page. The anchor ticket is done to increase the trust of the page. The link you offer in anchor text can be internal or external. When writing anchor text you will have to follow some tricks which are shown below.

  • You do not want to use the generic anchor text like click here.
  • You should provide the descriptive anchor text so that they provide some information about the linked page.
  • The page URL does not want to be directly anchor text like the page's URL.

With all these guideline, you should never use the reach anchor text to make your post more friendly.

Use Robots.txt

The robots.test file tells the search engine that they can access any part of your site and then crawl. Robots of your site. To check the text you can type www.yoursetenam.com/robots.text If you do not want the scare engine to crawl your page, you can go to the Google webmaster tools and create files.

WordPress Permalink

Your post's payroll search engine is basic and very essential for the hours. A lot of new blogger does not change the default payroll of your post and then remains behind your own conditions later.

You must create a template for your post that is null and contain your keyword. The following examples have been given which help you can find yourself in which of your visitors will help you to visit your site and index your search engine bottles for your site.

https://nllearning.com/9328497964/ml/665873447.htm
https://nllearning.com /why-is-seo-important-for-blogging-and-bloggers.html

The two URL given above are of the same post, but looking at the other URL you can say about the import of this URL save, which will help visitors to grab your site and index the search engine bottle. The first URL is not known to which URL is relocated from which topic. Visitors like this URL pay visitors are not too attracted and it is also difficult to crawl such articles for the search engine crawler.

Keyword optimized quality content

The quality content for none of the websites is one of the very important aspect basic WordPress save practices. The quality content is called the king of the content. It means that you should pay attention to the quality of your content. If you do not focus on the quality of your content, then your scree is saying to be useless. If your site has a quality content, then your site will like your visitors and again In such a way, if your visitors visit your site again, then the search engine automatically automatically increases your website's ranking.

To write a quality content, you keep your content simple, well organized and avoid speeling and grammar mistake.

Hopefully, these articles will be helpful for you.

Follow us on our social media accounts.

Thanks.

item.title: WordPress vs Blogger
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
WordPress vice-blogger: if we talk about blogging, we have lots of options to start a blog which we can select from anyone. But when we think of starting a blog, first of all, it comes to thinking where we can start our blog. WordPress and blogger is very famous for the blogging. But in both of these we should make selection for beginners, this is very confusing. In this post we are going to tell you who you select in WordPress and blogger.

WordPress vs blog:

Whenever it comes to WordPress and blogger, who is better than these, it depends on those people who think of what they think. If you do not want to take more technical hassles, then blogger is the best option for you. But if you are one of those who want some special power and features on your blog, wordpress is the best option for you. Below we have made a list of what's better in the wordpress blogger?

Why not blogger:

Blogger platform is a best option for beginners. If you are new to the field of blogging and you do not have technical knowledge and you do not want to spend money on your blog, then blogger is the best option for you.

Along with these benefits, functionalities of bloggers and so many limitations are there in the term of so many benefits. If you need a platform to start a blog with zero expense, then blogger is a right option.

But if you are doing this for your own branding or authority for kaia money, blog spot is not an ideal choice for you. Limited features is available to add to your blog in a blogger. Even in blogger, there is a lot of shortcomings in blogger which makes wordpress better than this.

If you want to save money from your blog and have a long term impact, wordpress is the best option for you.

Why not WordPress:

Wordpress gives you full control on your blog, and you can do anything you want. You can give your blog the way you want to look and feel by the help of free and paid plugins.

You will also get a full control of seo in the wordpress. By the help of some plugins you can make your blog friendly. Wordpress gives you the permission to do everything you want to do.

If you create your blog on wordpress, you must ask for your own blog. You have to install the wordpress on your own server. You will need technical knowledge to start the wordpress pay blog. But support is provided from the wordpress community whose help you learn everything in a very short time with ease.

If you start a blog by thinking that you have to save money from this and you have to be fame, wordpress is the best option for you. And if you are a business writer, blog-spot is the best option for you.

  • Hopefully, these articles will be helpful for you.
  • please also follow our social media accounts.

thanks.

item.title: WordPress mein kis Tara simple menu banaenge?
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
hi friends is article ma ma aapko bataunga ki aap apne wordpress ke website ma kis tarah main menu bar banaenge niche picture main aapko ek menu bar dikhai de raha hoga as artical ma Ham janenge ki ase tarah ka menu bar kaise banayenge.

Tu chale start karte Hain manu banane ke liye pahle aap apni website ka customize option ko open Kara.

Aur FIR niche main menu per click Karen.

Aur FIR aapko dikhai de raha hoga ki top navigation bar to stop navigation bar per click Karen.

click karne ke bad aapko kuchh item show ho rahe honge Jo aapke Man mein new ke sath attach hai jaise ki main aapko 2 picture mein niche show Kiya hua hai.

Pahle Jo hamare theme ke sath Jo menu bane hue ha isko Ham delete karenge. Q ki humne ek new menu banani hai jisse aapko samajh jaaye. Tu chale Jo niche delete ka option hai use per click Karen. Aap kya Jo menu hai o delete ho chuki hai ab apne website par ja Kare check kare sakte hain.

Chalo friends ab Ham start Karne wale ha ki new menu bar kis tarah banayenge Zara apna dimag khol lo aur focus karo.

new menu bar banane ke liye navigation bar ma creative new menu per click Karen.

Pahle Ham is menu ko naam denge. Tu ma isko naam dunga top menu aap apni marze se jo bhi naam Dena chahte Hain de sakte hain. Aur iske bad aap apni menu ko kis jagah per show karvana chahte Hain ose location ko select Kara aur pir next per click Kara.

Alberta agar aap chahe to ek location one by one try kar sakta hai jis jagah per bhi aapko aapke website ke mutabik pasand a jaaye usi jagah per chhod de. Location select karne ke bad aap next per click karna hai. Ab abe apna item select karne honga jo aapko niche picture mein dikhai de Gaya hai.

Ab ab aapane add item per click karna hai jiska Bad sab item aap ko show ho jaenge. matlab Mera ya hai ki jo Jo page aap ne banaye Ho gay vah show Ho jaenge aapke sam ne.

Ab aap Jo page apne menu mein add karna chahte hain usi usi ma ma plus ke nishan per click Karen.

Jo page aapane add kiye Hain uske bad aap niche add item button hai use per click Karen or par jakar apne website ko refresh Karen aur dekhkar aapki menu hua per show ho chuki hogi.

agar ap drop down menu banana chahte hain jaise ke photo mein niche dikhaya gaya hai to niche title per click Karen aur drop menu banane ka pura step by step article padhe.

Drop down menu kaise banaen wordpress ma.?
friends! agar aap apne website ko more attractive banana chahte Hain weavers ke liye to hamare is website ko follow Karen aur ham aapko step by step wordpress ke bare mein har chij se samjhe jaenge. aur agar aapka koi question hai to comment section mein aap humse poochh sakte hain.
item.category: WordPress mein kis Tara simple menu banaenge?

item.title: Drop down menu kaise banaen Wordpress ma.?
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends!

dropdown menu banane se pahle agar doston aap ko pata nahin hai ki ek simple menu kaise bante hain to niche article ki title per click Karen vah artical padhe uske bad aapko simple menu banane ka concept clear ho jaega.

WordPress mein kis Tara simple menu banaenge?

Chalo start karte hain dropdown-menu banane ke liye website ke customisation option mein jaaye.

Yahan per bus aapane ek simple sa kam karna hai draw and drop yah to apne suna hoga Na bus samajh jaaye yahi karna hai aapane.

ek page ko drop Karen matlab mouse ke sath utha Le aur ko dusre page ke niche Toda site per rakh le. Jaise ke picture ma show Kiya gaya hai.

iske bad aap publish per click Karen aur jakar apne website ko refresh Karen agar dekar apne menu mein jis page ke niche aapane drop down Kiya ta dusre page ko usi page per mouse Le jaaye aur aapko show ho jaega. Jaise ki picture main aapko niche show Kiya gaya hai.

Tu friends agar aap aur bhi ISI Tera drop menu banana chahte Hain to jaise mere Kiya hai draw and drop ISI tarah aap customisation mein jaaye aur draw and drop Karen aur aapke menu banti jaaye gi.

friends! agar aap apne website ko more attractive banana chahte Hain weavers ke liye to hamare is website ko follow Karen aur ham aapko step by step wordpress ke bare mein har chij se samjhe jaenge. aur agar aapka koi question hai to comment section mein aap humse poochh sakte hain.
item.category: Drop down menu kaise banaen Wordpress ma

item.title: How to install WordPress locally on your computer?
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends!

Wordpress localhost install karne ke liye Ham Two simple step karenge. first step jo hai aap apne computer ma baithana wordpress software download Kara. Bitnami software o software hai Jo ham log ko allow karta hai ki Ham apne wordpress website localhost ma run kar sakta hai. Bitnami download karne ke liye Google mein jaaye our search Kara bitnami WordPress or enter Karen.

Aur pir first link per click Karen aur pir bitnami wordpress ka download karne wale option per click Kara.

Jab bitnami download ho jaaye to hamara next step jo ho ga o bitnami install karna ho ga. install karte time aapane next next per click karna hai aur jab aapke pass niche picture ma jo interface Diya hua hai is tarah ka interface a jaaye to yahan per aapane apna naam website naam username aur password dekhkar next karna ha. yah password or username aapko bad mein jab aap apne wordpress website mein logon n hona chahie to yah usi time aapka kam aaega. Is ka bad aapa ne access wordpress per click karna hai.

Access wordpress per click karne ke bad aap dekh payenga gay ka wordpress aapke localhost per install ho chuka ho ga.

Aur ghar iske bad aap kisi time bhi apne wordpress per exercise karna chahte hain tu aapane localhost / WordPress slash logo in apne browser mein enter karna hai. uske bad aap username aur password dekh logon n Ho jaenge apne wordpress side mein aur per usko acchi tarah se customised kar payenge.

apne wordpress ko customise karne ke liye attractive banane ke liye hamare website ko follow Kara aur social media accounts ko bhi follow Kara.

Thankss..

item.title: How you can install a plugging in WordPress?. Hindi/Urdu
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends!
Aaj ka is article ma Ham dekhenga ke plugging kis tarah install hote Hain aur ya Kya Kam karte hain wordpress ma.

First wordpress plugin kya hai?
WordPress Pluging are used to add new features to your wordpress website.

Matlab yah hai hai ki aap apna WordPress maa new chijen add kar sakte hain. To yah new chij hai aap plugs ka madad se add Karen ge apne wordpress website mein iske bare mein example: lete Hain Ke aap apna phone ma Facebook dekhna chahte Hain tu aap playstore se Facebook download karenge. Tu Facebook aik new features hai aapke mobile ke liye. Ek aur example lete Hain Taki aapko acchi tarah samajh a jaaye. Jaise ki aap apne mobile mein ek video play karte Hain our video play karte time player does note supported a jata hai to iske liye aapane ek aur video player download karna padhta hai aap o video player play store se download karte hain aur pir o video ase new Media player ma play karte Hain to vah video play Ho jaati hai. Tu yah Jo player aapane download kiya hai mobile mein ya aapke mobile ke liye Pluging hai.

Ab dekhe jaise aapke mobile mein video play nahin ho rahi thi to aapane Media player install Kiya ISI tarah aapke website ma aapko ek features chahiye magar o feature aapke website ma nahin hai tu uske liye aapko plugging install karna hoga apna WordPress site ma.

Ab wordpress ma plugging install karne ke leya two method hai.

  1. To install the Pluging using the search.

Tu chale aik plugin install karte Hain search method se to pahle aap WordPress ka dashboard ma jaaye gay aur waha plugin pir click kara ga.

Iske bad aapane Add new per click karna hai aur aapke pass ek window open ho jayegi jisma upar ek search option hoga Jahan aap na plugins search kar sakte hain.

For example agar hum ne ek contact form plugging install karna hai tu Ham search karenge gay 'contact form' hamare pass difference plugin show Ho jaenge Jo plugging hama accha Laga usko install now per click Karen aur jab install ho jaaye pir activate per click Karen gay to aapki website ma plugin active ho Jaya ga.

Ab humne contact form plugin install kar liya hai magar ya kam kaise karega WordPress ma tu iske liye Jo plugging aapane install Kiya hi uske setting ma jaaye aur yah per ek code milega usko copy karke apne 'contact us' page ma past Kara aur pir save Kara aur website refresh Kara aur contact page mein jaya vahan per contact form banaa hoga Jase ka help sa log AP ka st contact Kare sakta ho ga.

Wordpress main har plugging ek dusre se difference difference kam karte hain. aapko jis cheez ka bare ma be plugging chahe hogi to comment section ma mujhse pucha ma aapko detail ke sath gate karunga.

Ab Ham second method dekhte hain ke plugging kaise install karenge o method hai. uploading the plugin.zip file

Sometime search method se plugging install nahin hote Hain problems karte hi to use time Ham yah second method use karenge plugin install karne ke liye.

For example agar aap ek premium plugin Harite Ha tu o aap ke pass Zip-form ma ajata ha per zip form ko Hm kaise WordPress website per upload or install karte Hai tu chale dekhte Hai.

Pahle aap apne wordpress ke dashboard ma jaaye aur per plugin ma jaaye aur add new per click Karen

Upar picture ma show hua hai ki add new per click kar karne ke bad upload plugin per click karna aur pir choose file per click karna. Our Jahan per aapane plug-in ka zip file rakha hai vahan se usko select Kara aur install per click Kara plugin install ho jaaye tu activitie per click Kara.

Uske bad aap jaya aur apne dashboard ma dekhea ek new option add ho chuka hoga aapke dashboard ma.

Our wordpress ke bare ma sikhane ke liye hamare website ko follow Kara aur social media accounts ko be follow Kara aur agar aapka koi question hai tu comment section mein puche ya mere social media accounts mein puche

Thanks

item.title: How to add pages in WordPress in Hindi/Urdu?
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends!

Aaj ke is article ma ham AP ko dikhayen ga ke aap WordPress ma ma pages kaise tarah add karenge. Tu chale start karte Hain.

dost agar Ham pages ki baat karta Ha to is ma itni mushkil wali baat nahin hai ok jaise post add hote hain usi tarah pages bhi hote Hain.

Ab sawal yah hai. Page use kaha hote Hai? Tu agar aap aapke blog ka under kuch aise statistic information deni hai. Jaise ki aap ne bhut sara website ma dekha hoga. About us page, contact us, home page etc etc.

Pages banane ke liye aap dashboard ma pages ke section ma jaaye ge.

Agar aap upar pictures mein dekhen to iska underface usi tarah hai jaise post ka hota hai. Ab yaha per hm na aik Naya page add karna ha tu add new pir click kara.

para title mein jo page aapane add karna hai uska name de aur niche tax mein jo aapane likhna hai vah likh Le page ke bare ma.

Aur FIR isko publish kar de. ISI tarah aap apne blog ya website ke liye contact page, about, home page, bana sakta hain. Our friends aage aane wale articles mein main aapko 1 by 1 page bana kar dikhaunga kis tarah contact us page mein contact form banta hai about us page mein apne bare mein kaise likha aur attractive kaise banaen.

Like my about page.

friends agar articles aapko acha laga Ho tu please apne friends ke sath bhi share Karen aur ham ko follow Karen website per bhi aur mukhtalif social media accounts per bhi.

Agar aapka koi question hai to comment section ma main poochh sakte hain.

Thanks.
item.category: how to add tags in wordpress pages
how to create tabs in wordpress pages

item.title: How to install Google Analytics on WordPress ( Hindi/Urdu )
item.dc:creator: noumanalikha12
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends!
Is article mein main aapko bataun ga ka kase tarah aap google-analytics apne wordpress set ma install Kare sakte hai.

tu pahle ma aapke mind ko Toda clear kar Leta Hun aapke mind ma kuch sawal aaye ho gaye o dekhte hai.

Q. What is Google analytics?
Google analytics bahut simple sa tool hai. Jis ke vajah se aap apne website mein sab kuch dekh sakte hai matlab yah hai ki google-analytics ke help se aap apne website ki performance dekh sakte hai. Google analytics show Kya karta hai. Ya ham show karata hai ke kitne logo na aapke website ko visit Kiya hai. Aur yah log Kahan se aaye Hai. For example: yah Facebook ke ling se aaye Hain Instagram se aaye Hain Google search se aaye Hai ya Twitter wagera se aaye Hai. aur logo ne kitna time aapke website per gujara hai aur kon sa page sabse jyada dekha jata hai aapke website ma. AP dekh sakte Hai ki ya chijen kitni important hai.

tu chale start karte hai step by step Google analytics install karte hai wordpress ma.

To pahle aap Google ma jaaye aur search Kara google.com/analytics to aapke pass kuch is tara Nazar aaega.

Aur fir apane sign-in per click karna hai fir analytics per click karna aur per sign-in Ho jaaye apne Google account ma.

Jaise aap sign-in Ho jaaye apne Google account ma to niche picture ma mai jo window show hui hai aapke pass be isi tarah ka show ho jayegi aur isma sign-up per click Kare le.

Sign up per click karne ke bad aapke pass ek form ajaega form ko fill kare de.
Isi form ma AP ka website ka naame aur URL ke bare mai poochha jaega aur niche is main kuchh option diye honge UN sab ko tik karna aur FIR get tracking id per click karna aur per I accept per click karna.

Tu jaise aap upar ke process Kare ga tu aapke Google analytical ka account ready ho jaega aur aapke pass aisa show hoga.

Ab Ham next step karenge Jo google-analytics account hm na banaya hai usko WordPress mai kaise install Kara.

tu Google analytics install karne ke liye wordpress ke dashboard mai jaenge aur FIR plugin ma jaaye aur add new per click Kare.

Our per search Karen plugin jiska naame Hai Google analytics dashboard our ase ko install Kara aur activate Karen.

Jaise aap activate per click karte hain plugin aap WordPress site per activate ho jata hai. Ab Ham next step karenge is plugging ko link karenge Google analytics account ke sath Jo humne banaya ta start mai jaise aap plugin install karle to aap apne wordpress dashboard mai dekhe sakte hain ek new icon.

Tu fir aap google-analytics mai jaya apne dishboard mai aur click Kara general setting per.

Aur FIR aapke pass Jo window open ho jayegi usmaa authorized plugin per click Kara

Aur FIR Jo window open ho jayegi usmaa Get access code per click Kara

FIR Google aap se confirmation manga ga aap allow per click Karen

Jaise aap allow per click Kare lenge aapke pass aik cord show ho jaega usko copy kar le.

aur fir Jaha per aapane get access code per click kiya tha use ke niche ek box ta box maa ya code paste kar le aur save per click kar le.

ab niche picture ma jo information Diya Gaya Hai agar aapke pass ase tarah information show Ho jaaye to uska matlab hai Google analytics aap ke site par install ho chuka hai our pir AP save change per click kar le.

aur aap apne wordpress ke dashboard per click Kara aur scroll down Kara aapko niche picture mai jo show Kiya Gaya Hai ase tarah ka ek gadget aapke dishbord page mein add ho chuka hoga jisse aap apne website ki traffic ko dekh sakte hai.

Ummid Hai yah artical aapke liye helpful sabit hoga agar aap ka koi question hai to aap comments mein bhi poochh sakte hain aur mere social media account per bhi poochh sakte hain.

Thanks
item.excerpt:encoded: Google analytics bahut simple sa tool hai. Jis ke vajah se aap apne website mein sab kuch dekh sakte hai matlab yah hai ki google-analytics ke help se aap apne website ki performance dekh sakte hai. Google analytics show Kya karta hai. Ya ham show karata hai ke kitne logo na aapke website ko visit Kiya hai. Aur yah log Kahan se aaye Hai. For example: yah Facebook ke ling se aaye Hain Instagram se aaye Hain Google search se aaye Hai ya Twitter wagera se aaye Hai. aur logo ne kitna time aapke website per gujara hai aur kon sa page sabse jyada dekha jata hai aapke website ma. AP dekh sakte Hai ki ya chijen kitni important hai.
